attributes.action: Set a good example to this country regarding health and fitness - Deputy PM to run the London marathon!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If there is a serious problem with health in this country, the Cabinet should set a good example by showing that despite leading busy lives it isn't impossible to keep fit and healthy.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
